title: 62J.49 AMBULANCE SERVICES FINANCIAL DATA.
text:
The director of the Office of Emergency Medical Services established under chapter 144E shall establish a financial data collection system for all ambulance services licensed in this state. To establish the financial database, the director may contract with an entity that has experience in ambulance service financial data collection.
All financial data collected by the director of the Office of Emergency Medical Services shall be classified as nonpublic data under section 13.02, subdivision 9.
